title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-10.6 - Strainers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-10.6 - Strainers

State Regulations
A small orifice or other opening in an oil supply system
likely to become clogged shall be protected by a suitable strainer. A strainer
employing an element other than a screen shall have a rated capacity not less
than the maximum firing rate of the burner to which it is
applied. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-10.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
